<div>Issues are the reports from either the public or a staff member about an issue in the city.</div>
<p>
Issues will contain the following fields:
</p>
<ul>
<li>Created by: the person who put the issue into the application</li>
<li>Category: the type of problem being reported</li>
<li>
Issue Type: Such as complaints, staff report, etc</li>
<li>Reported By: the person who is reporting the issue</li>
<li>Contacted Via: The way the person reporting the issue contacted the city (email, in person, phone, etc)</li>
<li>Comments:details about the issue</li>
<li>Respond via: The way the person reporting the issue would like to be contacted</li>
<li>Attachments</li></ul>

<p>The Issue section also contains the issue's [Histories history] and [Responses]
<h2>Future Improvements</h2>
<p>Some categories will be able to &nbsp;add additional fields to be filled out for an issue or offer pre-fabricated comments to choose from. You'll see these when you choose a category.</p>
